<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Sports Gambling Revenue Project</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Orbitron:wght@400;700;900&family=Roboto+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap');

        body {
            font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace;
            background-color: #0f172a;
            background-image: 
                radial-gradient(at 0% 0%, hsla(253,16%,7%,1) 0, transparent 50%), 
                radial-gradient(at 50% 0%, hsla(225,39%,30%,1) 0, transparent 50%), 
                radial-gradient(at 100% 0%, hsla(339,49%,30%,1) 0, transparent 50%);
            overflow: hidden;
            user-select: none;
        }

        .neon-text {
            text-shadow: 
                0 0 5px #fff,
                0 0 10px #fff,
                0 0 20px #eab308,
                0 0 30px #eab308,
                0 0 40px #eab308;
        }

        .slot-machine-frame {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #333 0%, #000 100%);
            box-shadow: 
                0 0 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.8),
                inset 0 0 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            border: 4px solid #444;
            border-radius: 20px;
            position: relative;
        }

        /* The gold trim */
        .slot-machine-frame::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -10px; left: -10px; right: -10px; bottom: -10px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #bf953f, #fcf6ba, #b38728, #fbf5b7, #aa771c);
            z-index: -1;
        }

        .reel-container {
            background: #fff;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: inset 0 0 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
            border-radius: 8px;
            position: relative;
        }

        /* Gradient overlay to give depth to reels */
        .reel-container::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, 
                rgba(0,0,0,0.6) 0%, 
                rgba(0,0,0,0) 20%, 
                rgba(0,0,0,0) 80%, 
                rgba(0,0,0,0.6) 100%);
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .reel {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            transition: transform 3s cubic-bezier(0.1, 0.9, 0.2, 1);
            will-change: transform;
        }

        .symbol {
            height: 100px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            filter: blur(0px);
        }

        /* Blur animation for spinning */
        .blur-spin {
            animation: blurEffect 0.2s infinite;
        }

        @keyframes blurEffect {
            0% { filter: blur(2px); }
            50% { filter: blur(4px); transform: translateY(-5px); }
            100% { filter: blur(2px); transform: translateY(5px); }
        }

        .lever-base {
            position: absolute;
            right: -60px;
            top: 100px;
            width: 40px;
            height: 100px;
            background: #333;
            border-radius: 0 10px 10px 0;
            border: 2px solid #555;
            z-index: -2;
        }

        .lever-arm {
            position: absolute;
            right: -50px;
            top: 130px;
            width: 20px;
            height: 120px;
            background: linear-gradient(to right, #ccc, #fff, #ccc);
            transform-origin: bottom center;
            transition: transform 0.5s ease;
            z-index: -1;
            border-radius: 10px;
        }

        .lever-knob {
            position: absolute;
            top: -30px;
            left: -15px;
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, #ff4d4d, #990000);
            border-radius: 50%;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: transform 0.1s;
        }
        
        .lever-knob:active {
            transform: scale(0.95);
        }

        .lever-arm.pulled {
            transform: scaleY(-1) translateY(100px); /* Simple flip visual */
        }

        .jackpot-text {
            font-family: 'Orbitron', sans-serif;
            opacity: 0;
            transform: scale(0.5);
            transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
        }

        .jackpot-text.show {
            opacity: 1;
            transform: scale(1);
        }

        .enter-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #eab308, #ca8a04);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
            transform: translateY(20px);
        }

        .enter-btn.visible {
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: auto;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }

        .enter-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eab308;
        }

        /* Sound Toggle */
        .sound-toggle {
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.3s;
            z-index: 50;
        }
        .sound-toggle:hover {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
        }

    </style>
</head>
<body class="flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen text-white">

    <!-- Sound Toggle Button -->
    <button id="sound-btn" class="sound-toggle" title="Toggle Sound">
        <svg id="icon-sound-on" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="text-yellow-400"><polygon points="11 5 6 9 2 9 2 15 6 15 11 19 11 5"></polygon><path d="M19.07 4.93a10 10 0 0 1 0 14.14M15.54 8.46a5 5 0 0 1 0 7.07"></path></svg>
        <svg id="icon-sound-off" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="text-gray-400 hidden"><polygon points="11 5 6 9 2 9 2 15 6 15 11 19 11 5"></polygon><line x1="23" y1="9" x2="17" y2="15"></line><line x1="17" y1="9" x2="23" y2="15"></line></svg>
    </button>

    <!-- Header / Title -->
    <div class="text-center mb-10 z-10 px-4">
        <h1 class="text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold mb-4 font-[Orbitron] tracking-wider text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-400 via-yellow-200 to-yellow-400 drop-shadow-[0_2px_2px_rgba(0,0,0,0.8)]">
            ODDS ON
        </h1>
        <p class="text-gray-300 text-sm md:text-lg tracking-widest uppercase">
            Sports Gambling Revenue Prediction in Illegal States
        </p>
    </div>

    <!-- Main Slot Machine Area -->
    <div class="relative">
        
        <!-- The Machine Frame -->
        <div class="slot-machine-frame p-6 md:p-8 w-[320px] md:w-[600px]">
            
            <!-- Result Display (Win/Lose Text) -->
            <div class="h-16 flex items-center justify-center mb-4 bg-black/50 rounded border border-gray-700 overflow-hidden">
                <div id="status-text" class="text-yellow-400 font-[Orbitron] text-xl tracking-widest">
                    PULL TO PLAY
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Reels Row -->
            <div class="grid grid-cols-3 gap-2 md:gap-4 h-[120px] md:h-[150px] mb-6">
                
                <!-- Reel 1 -->
                <div class="reel-container">
                    <div class="reel" id="reel1">
                        <!-- Symbols injected by JS -->
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Reel 2 -->
                <div class="reel-container">
                    <div class="reel" id="reel2">
                        <!-- Symbols injected by JS -->
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Reel 3 -->
                <div class="reel-container">
                    <div class="reel" id="reel3">
                        <!-- Symbols injected by JS -->
                    </div>
                </div>

            </div>

            <!-- Spin Button (Mobile Friendly alternative to lever) -->
            <button id="spin-btn-main" class="w-full bg-red-700 hover:bg-red-600 text-white font-bold py-4 rounded border-b-4 border-red-900 active:border-b-0 active:mt-1 transition-all md:hidden">
                SPIN!
            </button>
            
            <!-- Decorative Lights -->
            <div class="flex justify-between mt-4 md:mt-0">
                <div class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-red-500 animate-pulse"></div>
                <div class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-yellow-500 animate-pulse delay-75"></div>
                <div class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-green-500 animate-pulse delay-150"></div>
                <div class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-blue-500 animate-pulse delay-200"></div>
                <div class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-purple-500 animate-pulse delay-300"></div>
            </div>

        </div>

        <!-- Desktop Lever (Visual) -->
        <div class="hidden md:block lever-base"></div>
        <div class="hidden md:block lever-arm" id="lever-arm">
            <div class="lever-knob" id="lever-knob"></div>
        </div>

    </div>

    <!-- Enter Button (Appears after win) -->
    <div id="enter-container" class="mt-12 text-center h-20">
        <button id="enter-btn" class="enter-btn px-10 py-4 rounded-full text-black font-bold text-xl uppercase tracking-wider">
            Enter Analysis
        </button>
    </div>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <footer class="absolute bottom-4 text-gray-500 text-xs">
        <p>Data Science Final Project â€¢ [Zakari, Kimia, Law & Sukhman]</p>
    </footer>

    <script>
        // Configuration
        const symbols = ['ðŸ’', 'ðŸ‹', 'ðŸ‡', 'ðŸ’Ž', '7ï¸âƒ£', 'ðŸ’°', 'ðŸˆ', 'ðŸ€'];
        const winningSymbol = '7ï¸âƒ£'; // We force this result
        const reelHeight = 100; // Height of one symbol in px (matches CSS)
        const totalSymbolsInReel = 20; // Number of symbols to generate per reel for the animation strip
        
        // DOM Elements
        const reels = [document.getElementById('reel1'), document.getElementById('reel2'), document.getElementById('reel3')];
        const leverKnob = document.getElementById('lever-knob');
        const leverArm = document.getElementById('lever-arm');
        const spinBtnMain = document.getElementById('spin-btn-main');
        const statusText = document.getElementById('status-text');
        const enterBtn = document.getElementById('enter-btn');
        const soundBtn = document.getElementById('sound-btn');
        const iconSoundOn = document.getElementById('icon-sound-on');
        const iconSoundOff = document.getElementById('icon-sound-off');
        
        let isSpinning = false;
        let soundEnabled = true;

        /* --- AUDIO SYSTEM (Web Audio API) --- */
        const audioCtx = new (window.AudioContext || window.webkitAudioContext)();
        
        // Helper to create oscillators
        function playTone(freq, type, duration, startTime = 0, vol = 0.1) {
            if (!soundEnabled) return;
            if (audioCtx.state === 'suspended') audioCtx.resume();

            const osc = audioCtx.createOscillator();
            const gainNode = audioCtx.createGain();

            osc.type = type;
            osc.frequency.setValueAtTime(freq, audioCtx.currentTime + startTime);
            
            gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(vol, audioCtx.currentTime + startTime);
            gainNode.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.01, audioCtx.currentTime + startTime + duration);

            osc.connect(gainNode);
            gainNode.connect(audioCtx.destination);

            osc.start(audioCtx.currentTime + startTime);
            osc.stop(audioCtx.currentTime + startTime + duration);
        }

        // Sound: Mechanical Lever Pull / Click
        function playClickSound() {
            playTone(150, 'square', 0.1, 0, 0.1);
            playTone(100, 'sawtooth', 0.1, 0.05, 0.1);
        }

        // Sound: Spinning Reel (Looping Ticking)
        let spinInterval;
        function startSpinSound() {
            if (!soundEnabled) return;
            // Play a tick every 100ms
            spinInterval = setInterval(() => {
                playTone(800, 'square', 0.05, 0, 0.02);
            }, 80);
        }

        function stopSpinSound() {
            clearInterval(spinInterval);
        }

        // Sound: Reel Stop (Thud)
        function playStopSound() {
            playTone(100, 'triangle', 0.2, 0, 0.3); // Low thud
        }

        // Sound: Win (Arcade Coin Shower)
        function playWinSound() {
            if (!soundEnabled) return;
            const now = 0;
            // Arpeggio
            [523.25, 659.25, 783.99, 1046.50, 523.25, 659.25, 783.99, 1046.50].forEach((freq, i) => {
                playTone(freq, 'sine', 0.2, i * 0.1, 0.1);
            });
            // Final High Ping
            playTone(1567.98, 'square', 0.8, 0.8, 0.1);
        }

        // Toggle Sound UI
        soundBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            soundEnabled = !soundEnabled;
            if(soundEnabled) {
                iconSoundOn.classList.remove('hidden');
                iconSoundOff.classList.add('hidden');
                if (audioCtx.state === 'suspended') audioCtx.resume();
            } else {
                iconSoundOn.classList.add('hidden');
                iconSoundOff.classList.remove('hidden');
                stopSpinSound();
            }
        });


        /* --- GAME LOGIC --- */

        // Initialize Reels
        function initReels() {
            reels.forEach(reel => {
                reel.innerHTML = '';
                let html = '';
                for(let i=0; i<totalSymbolsInReel; i++) {
                    const randomSym = symbols[Math.floor(Math.random() * symbols.length)];
                    html += `<div class="symbol">${randomSym}</div>`;
                }
                reel.innerHTML = html;
            });
        }

        initReels();

        // Spin Logic
        function spin() {
            if (isSpinning) return;
            isSpinning = true;

            // 1. UI Updates
            statusText.innerText = "SPINNING...";
            statusText.classList.remove('neon-text', 'text-yellow-400');
            statusText.classList.add('text-gray-400');
            enterBtn.classList.remove('visible');

            // 2. Audio & Visuals
            playClickSound(); // Sound 1: Click
            startSpinSound(); // Sound 2: Spinning loop

            leverArm.classList.add('pulled');
            setTimeout(() => leverArm.classList.remove('pulled'), 500);

            // 3. Animate Reels
            reels.forEach((reel, index) => {
                const targetSymbol = 'ðŸ’°'; 
                
                reel.classList.add('blur-spin');

                reel.style.transition = 'none';
                reel.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                void reel.offsetWidth;

                const duration = 2 + (index * 0.5); 
                reel.style.transition = `transform ${duration}s cubic-bezier(0.15, 0.9, 0.3, 1)`;

                const currentContent = reel.innerHTML;
                let appendHtml = '';
                for(let i=0; i<20; i++) {
                   appendHtml += `<div class="symbol">${symbols[Math.floor(Math.random() * symbols.length)]}</div>`; 
                }
                appendHtml += `<div class="symbol">${targetSymbol}</div>`;
                
                reel.innerHTML = currentContent + appendHtml;

                const totalHeight = reel.scrollHeight;
                const targetY = -(totalHeight - 100); 

                requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                    reel.style.transform = `translateY(${targetY}px)`;
                });

                // Cleanup after spin finishes
                setTimeout(() => {
                    reel.classList.remove('blur-spin');
                    playStopSound(); // Sound 3: Thud per reel
                    
                    if (index === 2) {
                        gameFinished();
                    }
                }, duration * 1000);
            });
        }

        function gameFinished() {
            isSpinning = false;
            stopSpinSound(); // Stop the ticking loop
            
            playWinSound(); // Sound 4: Win Music!

            statusText.innerText = "JACKPOT! BAG SECUREDðŸ¤‘";
            statusText.classList.add('neon-text', 'text-yellow-400');
            statusText.classList.remove('text-gray-400');
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                enterBtn.classList.add('visible');
            }, 500);
        }

        // Event Listeners
        leverKnob.addEventListener('click', spin);
        spinBtnMain.addEventListener('click', spin);
        
        enterBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.location.href = 'home.html'; 
        });

    </script>
</body>
</html>
